description:
Just when Ren begins attending school, he`s seen kissing Haru goodbye by his classmate Kurosaki Juzen. A curious Juzen asks Ren if Haru is his boyfriend, but... Meanwhile, unable to get used to the increasingly close relationship of Haru and Ren, Ikuyoshi asks Haru a certain question. However, when Haru half-jokingly responds that he`d never be interested in a kid with so little sex appeal, Ren overhears their conversation...?!
Source: crunchyroll
